item.title: Road sweeper required, 8th February
item.description:
Please could you send the road sweeper down Chaucer Road, Sidcup. The road hasn’t been swept for many months and detritus is building up along the kerb, particularly outside number 44. Many thanks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 44, Chaucer Road, Albany Park, Sidcup, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sign needs rebuilding, 8th February
item.description:
The posts of the woodland sign in the park are totally rotten (see photo) and the sign is likely to fall any day. Not only would it be a shame to lose the sign, but it could also injure someone or a dog as it falls. Please can you replace it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Abbey Hill Park, Albany Park, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Two full black sacks left on the street, 8th February
item.description:
One sack was there last night around 11pm. Now there are two, one torn (probably by animals). The content seems to be household waste, as I saw small bones near the sacks.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Maple Path, London
Report on FixMyStreet
